name: Verifying Legitimate Treatments
description: Training in identifying authentic medical treatments while filtering out suppressed cures and controlled industry deception.

cards.title: How to Research Medical Treatments Independently
cards.description: Techniques for conducting unbiased investigations into treatment options.
cards.bulletpoints: Analyzing study methodologies, funding source tracking, cross-referencing global research

cards.title: Suppressed Treatments and Alternative Medicine
cards.description: Investigating natural remedies and suppressed medical solutions.
cards.bulletpoints: Herbal antivirals, non-toxic cancer treatments, historical suppression of cures

cards.title: Recognizing Weaponized Medicine & Controlled Harm
cards.description: Distinguishing between genuine healthcare and industry-driven harm.
cards.bulletpoints: Long-term side effect monitoring, depopulation agendas, unethical human trials
